From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia




2020 Indian filmBeautiful: An Ode to RangeelaDirected byAgastya ManjuWritten byK. K. BinojeeScreenplay byAgastya ManjuStory byAgastya ManjuProduced byNaresh Kumar TSridhar T.Ram Gopal Varma (presenter)StarringNaina GangulyK. K. BinojeeParth SuriCinematographyAgastya ManjuEdited byAbhishek OjhaMusic byRavi ShankarProductioncompanyA Tiger / Company ProductionRelease date
1 January 2020 (2020-01-01)
Running time123 minutesCountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Beautiful: An Ode to Rangeela is a 2020 Indian Hindi-language romantic drama film directed by Agastya Manju, and produced by Naresh Kumar T.[1][2] The film stars Naina Ganguly, K. K. Binojee, and Parth Suri in pivotal roles. It was released on 1 January 2020, and simultaneously dubbed into Telugu language.[3][4]


Premise[edit]
The film is an ode to Ram Gopal Varma's classic Rangeela. The story revolves around a poor mechanic who falls in love with an aspiring actress who becomes popular.[5]

Cast[edit]
Naina Ganguly
K. K. Binojee
Parth Suri
